summary: This document is an email chain between an Assistant United States Attorney and Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) staff regarding the delivery of a laptop and new hard drive containing discovery materials to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell. It details logistical arrangements for delivering the equipment to facilitate her review of case materials while in custody.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The inmate for whom a laptop and discovery materials are being delivered to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) for case review.

events.title: Arrangement for Discovery Delivery to Maxwell
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney coordinates the delivery of a laptop and a new hard drive containing discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC.

locations: Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC), East Building, 29th Street near Std Avenue
1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007 (Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was an inmate at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) under registration number 02879-509 as of November 2020.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively providing discovery materials to Maxwell for her legal defense review while she was in custody.
Logistical coordination for delivering a laptop and hard drive to a high-profile inmate involved specific drop-off procedures at the MDC's East Building.
